tooltip.logicchips.and_gate: The §eAND Chip§r gives only an Output, when all inputs have a signal
tooltip.logicchips.nand_gate: The §eNAND Chip§r gives an Output, as long not all inputs have a signal
tooltip.logicchips.or_gate: The §eOR Chip§r gives an Output, as long there is anywere a input signal
tooltip.logicchips.nor_gate: The §eNOR Chip§r gives an Output, when there is no input signal
tooltip.logicchips.xor_gate: The §eXOR Chip§r gives an Output, only when the total input signals is an odd number
tooltip.logicchips.xnor_gate: The §eXNOR Chip§r gives an Output, only when the total input signals is an even number
tooltip.logicchips.and_gate_3: The §eAND Chip§r gives only an Output, when all inputs have a signal
tooltip.logicchips.nand_gate_3: The §eNAND Chip§r gives an Output, as long not all inputs have a signal
tooltip.logicchips.or_gate_3: The §eOR Chip§r gives an Output, as long there is anywere a input signal
tooltip.logicchips.nor_gate_3: The §eNOR Chip§r gives an Output, when there is no input signal
tooltip.logicchips.xor_gate_3: The §eXOR Chip§r gives an Output, only when the total input signals is an odd number
tooltip.logicchips.xnor_gate_3: The §eXNOR Chip§r gives an Output, only when the total input signals is an even number
tooltip.logicchips.cap_release: the Capacitor releases the energy again after it is fully charged.
tooltip.logicchips.cap_charge: the Capacitor charges per Input with the §cRPL/S*§r formel
